org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_superres

Class SuperResolution

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.Algorithm
        • org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_superres.SuperResolution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Namespace(value="cv::superres")
 @NoOffset
 @Properties(inherit=opencv_superres.class)
public class SuperResolution
extends Algorithm
    \brief Base class for Super Resolution algorithms.

    The class is only used to define the common interface for the whole family of Super Resolution algorithms.
